string.value: You have now reached the apex of the Maple world, the one who is considered the ultimate bowman. To commemorate your sterling accomplishment of reaching level 200, #b#p2081300##k has something in store for you.

It's the one thing that countless bowmen, who have used bows to pierce the darkness this world offers, strived for, but couldn't get... but now, #p2081300# is introducing me to #t1902002#... I heard only the very best in the world of Maple can be friends with #t1902002#.
At a point where I never thought I could go any higher, I made a new friend that certainly put me over the top.
나는 그대를 알고 있지. 아주 오래 전 요정이 지키는 마을에서 궁수로 태어났고, 설원의 땅에서 그 강함을 인정받았으며... 메이플 월드 모든 궁수들의 사제인 나에게서 새로운 이름을 지음받은 그대여...
이제는 더 이상 오를 곳이 없는 지고의 경지에 이른 그대에게 새로운 동반자를 소개하지. 극을 꿰뚫는 활을 가진 수많은 궁수들이 원했지만, 누구도 소유도 된 적이 없는 존재. 바하뮤트를... 어떤가. 그를 원하는가?
인간이 아니되, 인간보다 더 높은 자존심을 가진 바하뮤트지만... 초월의 경지에 이른 그대라면 그의 주인이 될 자격이 충분할 듯 보이는군.
미지의 존재와 우정을 나눌 준비가 되었거든, 다시 나를 찾아오라.
아직 마음의 준비가 되지 않은 모양이군요... 이미 메이플 월드의 누구도 그대를 이길 수 없는데, 무엇을 두려워 하는 건가요.

I know who you are. You were born a bowman a long time ago at a town fiercely protected by the Elves, established your presence and power at the land of the snow, and... I also bestowed you of a name worthy of a great bowman.

Now that you have reached the highest you can go as a bowman, I'll introduce to you a new companion. Countless bowmen have used bows to pierce the darkness this world offers, strived for it, but couldn't get it, and now you have the opportunity to get it... What do you think... do you want #t1902002#?

It may not be a human, but #t1902002# is much more proud than the humans... but, if it's someone like you, who's reached the level only a select few can dare reach, then it should serve you with the utmost loyalty.
If you are ready to engage in a powerful friendship with an unknown being, then let me know.
I don't think you are ready. No one in Maple can defeat you, so why fear the change? As one with superior accuracy and the keenest eyes in the Maple World, this should seem enticing to you...
Once you are ready to accept your new companion, step up. You will now be encountering a mysterious being totally unlike anything you've ever faced.

You are the one who has already exceeded the boundaries and the limits of a human being... the only time the proud #t1902002# bows its head is to you. Hopefully you'll experience new, amazing adventures that are surely to await you with #t1902002#...

I don't think you are ready to fully embrace #t1902002#, yet. In order for you to meet #t1902002#, you'll first have to have some experience with #t1902001#. Until you bring me #b#t1902001##k and #b#t1912000##k, I am afraid I won't be able to introduce you to #t1902002#.
